rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area adhering to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Modern living space integrating open-plan design, complemented by natural lighting and central courtyard view.
Contemporary dining area adjacent to the living area with provision for indoor-outdoor seating near the balcony.
Fully equipped modern kitchen designed for luxury segment, ensuring optimum workflow and adherence to local building codes.
Open lounge area adjoining living room, offering easy access to the central courtyard.

openings.description: Grand entrance door designed with security and aesthetic in mind.
Spacious balcony overlooking the courtyard, providing natural light and ventilation.
Designated opening to access central courtyard from living area.

rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with spacious balcony for relaxation, designed following Vastu principles for energy flow.
Private bathroom integrated with bedroom_1, featuring modern fixtures and ample storage.

openings.description: Spacious balcony offering scenic views of the courtyard and natural light.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring privacy and luxury.
Modern bathroom designed to complement bedroom_2, integrating contemporary design with local building norms.

openings.description: Spacious balcony providing a relaxing outdoor space with views of the surrounding landscape.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with an expansive balcony designed to offer tranquility and privacy while aligning with Vastu guidelines.
Luxurious bathroom integrated within the master bedroom, featuring modern amenities.

openings.description: Expansive balcony ensuring ample natural light and a pleasant outdoor experience.

rooms.description: Integrated central courtyard accessible from all levels to provide natural light and a refreshing environment.
